full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement – Icebreaking and Support Services

---

#### Notice Details

| **Field**          | **Value**                                      |
|---------------------|------------------------------------------------|
| **Solicitation Number** | WS4379819876                                    |
| **Publication Date**   | April 11, 2024                                  |
| **Tender Closing Date** | May 23, 2024, 2:00 PM ET                         |

#### Contract Overview

A Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for icebreaking and support services has been issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG). This procurement seeks a provider to supply, on an as-and-when-required basis, icebreaking services (escort, icebreaking under bridges, icebreaking of ports) and maintenance services for aids to navigation (buoys) in the Great Lakes, St Lawrence, and Baie des Chaleurs sectors. This contract also aims to promote Indigenous business participation through an incentives program.

#### Key Contract Details

#### Trade Agreements
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Regions of Opportunity
* Quebec (excluding the National Capital Region)
* Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region)

#### Qualification and Procurement Methods
Competitive procurement will be followed. The lowest price will be the selection criterion.


#### Solicitation Documents and Contact Information

Further details can be found at the following URL: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19374872?extsite=MTkzNzQ4NzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

For any inquiries, please contact Gabriel Piras from PSPC:
 Email: [gabriel.piras@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:gabriel.piras@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
No phone or fax number has been provided.
